text:
e="preserve">The Citroën Berlingo is a series of almost identical vans and leisure activity vehicles produced by Citroën in three generations since 1996. It is builded in cooperation with Peugeot.
Peugeot make the same vehicle but with a different name, The name is: Peugeot Partner.
First generation (1996–2012).
Citroën created the first generation Berlingo I in July 1996 and Peugeot created Peugeot Partner I in 1996.
In 2004, the model was improved at the front, It had a new bumper, bonnet, and headlamps.
Second generation (2008–2018).
The second generation Citroën Berlingo II was created in April 2008, The Peugeot Partner II was created in May 2008.
The second generation leisure activity vehicles have different names, They are: Citroën Berlingo Multispace and Peugeot Partner Tepee.
Third generation (2018–).
The third generation Citroën Berlingo III and Peugeot Rifter were unveiled in March 2018.
